name: TXP_MELD_PELD_AUD
description: The audit trail for the Model for End-Stage Liver Disease (MELD), Pediatric End-Stage Liver Disease (PELD), and liver status of the patient.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: MELD_AUDIT
columns.description: Stores the audit information for Model for End-Stage Liver Disease (MELD) values for the transplant episode.

columns.name: PELD_AUDIT
columns.description: Stores the audit information for Pediatric Model for End-Stage Liver Disease (PELD) values for the transplant episode.

columns.name: MELD_DATE_AUDIT_DT
columns.description: Stores the audit information for the Model for End-Stage Liver Disease (MELD) dates for the transplant episode.

columns.name: PELD_DATE_AUDIT_DT
columns.description: Stores the audit information for Pediatric Model for End-Stage Liver Disease (PELD) dates for the transplant episode.

columns.name: MELDPELD_OTHR_AUDIT
columns.description: Stores the audit information for the Model for End-Stage Liver Disease (MELD), Pediatric Model for End-Stage Liver Disease (PELD), and liver status free-text exceptions for the transplant episode.

columns.name: LIVER_ST_AUDIT_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the audit trail information for the liver status for the transplant episode.

columns.name: MELDPELD_UPD_USR_ID
columns.description: Stores the user responsible for the corresponding audit event for the transplant episode.

columns.name: MELDPELD_UPD_USR_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: MELD_PELD_UPD_INST_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the corresponding audit event occurred for the transplant episode.

columns.name: MELDPELD_AUD_EVNT_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the type of audit event (add, edit, or remove) that took place for the transplant episode.
